topic: Some believe healthcare should be completely free for all citizens, while others think people should pay for medical services. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
essayText:
Some say healthcare free, other say must pay. Both have reason.

Free healthcare good because poor people can see doctor. Everyone should healthy. If sick and no money very bad. Country like canada have free healthcare.

But free healthcare expensive. Who pay? Tax payer pay everything. Not fair for healthy people. Also people go doctor too much if free. Waiting time very long.

Pay healthcare mean better service. Private hospital more good equipment. Doctor work harder.

I think both way have problem. Maybe some free some pay better.

So healthcare difficult issue. Every country different solution.
weaknesses: Major grammatical errors in every sentence
